title: Darkside
description: Jonathon's home has been attacked. His dad's in an asylum, he's running for his life, and there's nowhere to hide. He's stumbled on the city's greatest Darkside. A place where nightmares walk the streets, incredibly dangerous and unimaginably exciting, Darkside is ruled by Jack the Ripper's children. You think you're in trouble now, but your problems have just begun... This supernatural suspense thriller, full of unforgettable characters and a dash of gothic horror, comes complete with fabulous die-cut glow-in-the-dark cover!
author: Tom Becker
